learning_outcomes.description: effectively communicate a comprehensive and in-depth knowledge of the research field related to your self-selected topic in sports and exercise medicine

assessments.task_description: An individual research report on a topic / project appropriate to clinical sports and exercise medicine as typically guided by an area previously covered in coursework in SPMD7001, SPMD7002, SPMD7003, SPMD7004 and SPMD7005 or of clinical interest for the individual practitioner.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Submit to the Turnitin submission portal via Blackboard.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description:

Final Report (10 - 15 pages, excluding references).
assessments.submission_guidelines: Submit to the Turnitin submission portal via Blackboard.

assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.due_date:
15/06/2026 - 19/06/2026

To be scheduled directly with Course Coordinator.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You cannot defer or apply for an extension for this assessment.
assessments.late_submission: You will receive a mark of 0 if this assessment is submitted late.
assessments.additional_info: You cannot defer or apply for an extension for this assessment.

learning_activities.topic:
Research Proposal

Submission of a research proposal (300 - 500 words) that outlines the research topic and planned areas (e.g., epidemiological / etiological information, diagnosis, management) for the planned SPMD7009 project

Learning outcomes: L01
